channel.title: Basics on Dezible
channel.description: Recent content in Basics on Dezible

item.title: Cryptography
item.description: Ques: What is the meaning of Probabilistic Polynomial Time (PPT) adversary or algorithm? Ans: https://crypto.stackexchange.com/questions/62976/what-is-the-meaning-of-probabilistic-polynomial-time-adversary Ques: What is the ROM (random oracle method)? Ans: https://crypto.stackexchange.com/questions/879/what-is-the-random-oracle-model-and-why-is-it-controversial Ques: What is the difference between ROM (Random Oracle Method) and SM (Standard Model)? Ans: https://crypto.stackexchange.com/questions/43668/random-oracle-model-vs-standard-model-vs-selective-model

item.title: Mathematics
item.description: Ques: What is the domain and image of a function? Ans: Domain of a function is the set of input values accepted by the function. Image of a function is the set of output values generated by the function
